input_text: Despite the fact that it was raining heavily, the marathon runners continued their race with determination and enthusiasm.

translations.to_french: Malgré le fait qu'il pleuvait lourdement, les coureurs du marathon ont poursuivi leur course avec détermination et enthousiasme.
translations.to_english: Despite the fact that it was raining heavily, the marathon runners continued their race with determination and enthusiasm.

input_text: She postponed the meeting until her manager, who had been away on a business trip, returned to the office with the final approval.

translations.to_french: Elle a reporté la réunion jusqu'à ce que son gestionnaire, qui était parti en voyage d'affaires, revienne au bureau avec l'approbation finale.
translations.to_english: She postponed the meeting until her manager, who had gone on a business trip, returned to the office with final approval.

input_text: While I enjoy spending time with friends at the beach, I often find myself yearning for the solitude of the mountains.

translations.to_french: Tandis que j'aime passer du temps avec des amis à la plage, je me retrouve souvent à désirer la solitude des montagnes.
translations.to_english: While I like to spend time with friends at the beach, I often find myself wanting the loneliness of the mountains.

input_text: The scientist explained the experiment in detail so that everyone, including those without a background in physics, could understand the significance of the findings.

translations.to_french: Le scientifique a expliqué l'expérience en détail afin que tout le monde, y compris ceux qui n'ont pas d'expérience en physique, puisse comprendre la signification des résultats.
translations.to_english: The scientist explained the experience in detail so that everyone, including those with no physical experience, could understand the meaning of the results.

input_text: If you work hard and stay focused on your goals, you will achieve more than you ever thought possible in life.

translations.to_french: Si vous travaillez dur et restez concentré sur vos objectifs, vous atteindrez plus que vous ne l'avez jamais pensé possible dans la vie.
translations.to_english: If you work hard and stay focused on your goals, you will achieve more than you ever thought possible in life.

input_text: Although the restaurant was highly recommended by locals, the service was slow, and the food did not live up to our expectations.

translations.to_french: Bien que le restaurant ait été fortement recommandé par les habitants, le service a été lent et la nourriture n'a pas été à la hauteur de nos attentes.
translations.to_english: Although the restaurant was highly recommended by the locals, the service was slow and the food did not meet our expectations.

input_text: Because she studied diligently every night for the past month, Maria performed exceptionally well on her final exams.

translations.to_french: Parce qu'elle a étudié diligemment tous les soirs du mois dernier, Maria s'est exceptionnellement bien comportée lors de ses examens finaux.
translations.to_english: Because she studied diligently every night last month, Maria performed exceptionally well during her final exams.

input_text: The company implemented new policies to improve employee satisfaction, which, in turn, led to increased productivity across all departments.

translations.to_french: L'entreprise a mis en oeuvre de nouvelles politiques pour améliorer la satisfaction des employés, ce qui a entraîné une augmentation de la productivité dans tous les ministères.
translations.to_english: The company has implemented new policies to improve employee satisfaction, resulting in increased productivity across all departments.

input_text: After the storm had passed and the sun reappeared, the children ventured outside to play in the puddles left behind.

translations.to_french: Après la tempête et la réapparition du soleil, les enfants se sont aventurés à l'extérieur pour jouer dans les flaques laissées derrière.
translations.to_english: After the storm and the reappearance of the sun, the children ventured outside to play in the puddles left behind.

input_text: Whenever he travels abroad, John makes it a point to learn a few basic phrases in the local language to show respect for the culture.

translations.to_french: Chaque fois qu'il voyage à l'étranger, John fait un point pour apprendre quelques phrases de base dans la langue locale pour montrer le respect de la culture.
translations.to_english: Every time he travels abroad, John makes a point to learn some basic phrases in the local language to show respect for culture.
